name: bract
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of leaf that grows from the area just below a flower and is sometimes different in shape or colour from the main leaves: Poinsettias are popular for their attractive red bracts.
espy3008/iStock/Getty Images Plus/Getty Images /GettyImages
